content: The specs says "The return content is a Bundle with type set to history containing the specified version history, sorted with oldest versions last, and including deleted resources. Each entry SHALL minimally contain either a resource which holds the resource as it is at the conclusion of the interaction, or a request with entry.request.method", so what is the resource at the conclusion of a delete request? Maybe an empty resource?
entry.resource is not present in that case
One more question, can the parameters _count, _at and _since be used in any combination?
